GSP33brsgor4u:6: sādhanaṃ nirūpya phalaṃ nirūpyata ityadhyāyayorhatuphalabhāvaṃ saṃgatimāha-tṛtīya iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:8: pūrvaṃ sākṣādeva śrutyuktaṃ saṃnyāsādi sādhanaṃ cintitaṃ,
GSP33brsgor4u:10: tadārabhya jīvanmuktistato dvitīyapāde utkrāntistṛtīye arcirādimārgasya gantavyasya ca nirṇayaścaturthe jñānopāsanayoḥ phalanirṇaya iti pādārthavivekaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:11: ādyādhikaraṇasya śravaṇādisādhanaṃ viṣayamanūdya dvedhānuṣṭhānadarśanātsaṃśayamāha-ātmā vā iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:14: mokṣe viśeṣābhāvavacchravaṇādāvāvṛttiviśeṣo nāstīti dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇāvāntarasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brsgor4u:15: atra pūrva pakṣe śravaṇādeḥ prayājavadadṛṣṭārthatvātsakṛdanuṣṭhānaṃ phalaṃ,
GSP33brsgor4u:27: sa raikvo yadveda tatprāṇatattvaṃ raikvādanyo 'pi yaḥ kaścidveda tatphale sarvamantarbhavatītyetadukte itthaṃ mayotkṛṣṭatvena sa raikva ukta iti haṃsaṃ prati haṃsāntaravacanaṃ,
GSP33brsgor4u:36: ādityasyaikasyaivodgīthe saṃpādyopāsanānmama tvameka eva putro 'sīti kauṣītakiḥ putramuvāca,
GSP33brsgor4u:37: atastvaṃ tathā mākṛthāḥ kintu bahūn raśmīnādityaṃ ca paryāvartayatāt pṛthagāvartayasvetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:46: tayoḥ parokṣajñānahetutvasvābhāvyādāvṛttāvapi na sākṣātkāraḥ syāditi pariharati-nāsakṛdapīti /
GSP33brsgor4u:52: dvitīyasya tu pratibandhanirāsāya tadapekṣeti samādhatte-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:54: yathā ṣaḍjādisvarabhedasākṣātkāraśaktamapi śrotramabhyāsamapekṣate tathā brahmātmasākṣātkāraśaktaṃ vākyaṃ tadapekṣamityanubhavamāśrityāha-nahi dṛṣṭe 'nupapannaṃ nāmeti /
GSP33brsgor4u:58: āropitāṃśanirāsāya na me deho nendriyamityabhyāso yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:68: nirduḥkhe cidātmani duḥkhādidhiyo bhrāntitvādvākyārthānubhavo na virudhyata ityāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brsgor4u:69: anubhave jāte 'pyāvṛttyādyanuṣṭhānaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-na caivamiti /
GSP33brsgor4u:70: ratiḥ kāmaḥ ātmakāmatayā tṛptirviṣayatṛṣṇākṣayaḥ tena saṃtoṣe ātmānandānubhava iti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:71: nanvāvṛttau niyogātpravṛttirvācyā tathā ca niyuktatvabuddherakartrātmadhīrna syādityata āha-tatrāpīti /
GSP33brsgor4u:80: pūrvatra dhyānāderāvṛttiruktā tāmupajīvya tattvajñānārthaṃ dhyānāvṛttikāle kimahaṃ brahmeti dhyātavyamuta matsvāmīśvara ityaikyabhedamānābhyāṃ saṃśayamāha-ya iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:86: kiñca kimīśvarasya jīvamātratvamaikyaṃ jīvasyeśvaramātratvaṃ veti vikalpya krameṇa dūṣayati-īśvarasya cetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:92: īśvarasya jīvatvaṃ na pratipādyaṃ yeneśvarābhāvaḥ syātkintu jīvasyeśvaratvam /
GSP33brsgor4u:97: vādināṃ satyatvāgrahastvavidyāvijṛmbhita iti vedasatyatvābhāvo na doṣa ityāha-neti /
GSP33brsgor4u:107: na pratīke na hi saḥ / BBs_4,1.4 /
GSP33brsgor4u:110: yathā brahmaṇyabhedasattavādahaṅgraha ukta evaṃ pratīkeṣvapi brahmavikāratayā jīvābhinnabrahmābhinnatvājjīvābhedasattvenāhaṅgrahaḥ kārya iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:119: vikārasya brahmaṇā svarūpaikyāyogādbādhenaikyaṃ vācyaṃ pratīkabādhe copāstividhirna syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:121: tathāca bādhamūlabrahmaikyajñānaṃ dvārīkṛtya pratīkeṣvahaṅgrahopāstikalpanā na yuktā,
GSP33brsgor4u:123: ato jīvapratīkayoḥ svarūpabhedādahaṅgrahe vidhyaśravaṇācca nāhaṅgraha iti phalitamāha-ataśceti /
GSP33brsgor4u:124: yathā rucakasvastikayoḥ suvarṇātmanaikye 'pi mitho naikyaṃ tathā jīvapratīkayoḥ brahmātmanaikye 'pi bhedaḥ samaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:125: yadica dharmivyatirekeṇa tayorabhāvaniścayādvastvaikyaṃ tadopāsanoccheda ukta ityarthaḥ //4//
GSP33brsgor4u:140: ataḥ pariśeṣādadhyāsa eva sāmānādhikaraṇyakāraṇam adhyāse ca niyāmakābhāvātsaṃśaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:143: siddhānte tu vikāradṛṣṭyā brahmaṇa upāsyatve nikarṣaprāptau satyāṃ phalavattvāsiddhervikārā evotkṛṣṭabrahmadṛṣṭyopāsyā iti phalam /
GSP33brsgor4u:144: kiñca laukikanyāyāviruddhārthasaṃbhave viruddhārtho na grāhyaḥ pratyavāyaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsgor4u:147: tathā cādityādayo brahmadṛṣṭyopāsyā ityeva vākyārtha ityāha-prāthamyācceti /
GSP33brsgor4u:149: itiśabdaśiraskaḥ śabdaḥ samabhivyāhṛtakriyālakṣaka iti loke prasiddhamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:155: kiñca yaddṛṣṭyā vikārasyotkarṣaḥ tasya brahmaṇo viśeṣaṇatve 'pyupāsyatvaṃ cātītyāha-īdṛśaṃ ceti //5//
GSP33brsgor4u:162: tairevādiriti upadrava iti ca bhaktidvayādhikaiḥ saptāṃśa sāmeti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:165: siddharūpādityādibhyaḥ karmarūpodgīthādīnāṃ phalasaṃnikarṣeṇotkarṣādbrahmavadviśeṣaṇatve niyama iti dṛṣṭāntena mukhyaṃ pūrvapakṣamāha-athaveti
GSP33brsgor4u:171: tatra yadi ṛksāmātmakayoḥ karmāṅgayoḥ pṛthivyagnidṛṣṭhiḥ syāt,
GSP33brsgor4u:181: nanu yatropāstīnāṃ prakṛtakarmāpūrvasaṃnikṛṣṭāṅgadvārāpekṣaṃ phalaṃ śrutaṃ tatra
GSP33brsgor4u:184: yathā svatantrapaśuphalasyāpi godohanasya aṅgadvārāpekṣayaiva phalamiṣṭaṃ tadvallokādiphaleṣūpāsaneṣvapi karmāpūrvāṅgadvāraiva phalakalpanā
GSP33brsgor4u:192: siddhādityādyātmanā karmaṇāṃ dṛṣṭau karmatvahāniḥ syādityata āha-ādityādibhāveneti /
GSP33brsgor4u:198: tathā cātra ṛksāmayoḥ pṛthivyāgnidṛṣṭipakṣe 'pi ṛksāmapadābhyāṃ svavācyārthe draṣṭavyatākhyaparamparāsaṃbandhena pṛthivyagnilakṣaṇā yuktetyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:199: nanu pratīkavācipadasya dhyeye arthe lakṣaṇā na yuktā,
GSP33brsgor4u:201: tathāpi ṛksāmasaṃbandhātpṛthivyagnyorevaitasyāmṛcyadhyūḍhaṃ sāmeti mukhyayoḥ pṛthaguktestadetasyāmityatrāpi tayorgrahe punaruktiḥ syāt,
GSP33brsgor4u:202: ataḥ pratīkābhedadṛṣṭyā pṛthivyagnyoḥ pratīkasaṃnidhānāttayoreva pratīkapadaprayogaḥ kṛtastabhedadārḍhyāyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:204: sthitaprayogasya nimittaṃ kimapi vācyaṃ na tu nimittamastīti prayoga āpādya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:206: tasya kāryaṃ rathacaryādi yadā rājeva karoti tadā kṣattṛśabdo rājanyapyastītyakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:209: sāmātmanā lokānupāsīteti dvitīyāsaptamyorbhaṅgastvayā kāryastato varaṃ lokātmanā sāmopāsīteti saptamīmātrabhaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:210: eteneti ekavibhaktibhaṅgalāghavena prāṇātmanā gāyatraṃ sāmopāsyamiti vyākhyātamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:212: 'sāmna upāsanaṃ sādhu'ityupakramya pṛthivī hiṅgāra ityādinā hiṅgārādipañcāvayavasya sāmna upāsanamuktvā 'iti tu pañcavidhasyopāsanam'ityupasaṃhṛtya,
GSP33brsgor4u:213: atheti saptavidhasya sāmna upāsanaṃ prakramya prapañcitamataḥ sāmna evopāsyatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:216: yadyapi hiṅkāroddeśena pṛthivītvavidheruddeśyasya prathamanirdeśo vācyastathāpyuktanyāyabalādvyatyayo grāhya ityarthaḥ //6//
GSP33brsgor4u:224: siddhānte tu manodehayorbhinnatve 'pi dehacāñcalye manaso 'navasthānasya anubhavasiddhatvānmanovyāpāreṣūpāsaneṣu dehasthairyārthamāsananiyamāpekṣeti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:237: brahmasya śārīrasya cāsanasya smaraṇānniyama ityāha-smaranti ceti //10//
GSP33brsgor4u:242: teṣvevāṅgānāśritopāsaneṣu prācyādidiśi tīrthādideśe pradoṣādikāle niyamo 'sti na vetyubhayathāsaṃbhavātsaṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:243: ekaviṣayatvaṃ saṃgatirūpāstīnāṃ vihitatvādyāgādivadasti digādiniyama iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:248: prācīnapravaṇe prāgdeśe nimnasthāne vaiśvadevaṃ kuryāditivadatra digādiviśeṣo na śrūyate ato 'numānamaprayojakamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:253: vācanikaṃ samadeśādiniyamamaṅgīkṛtya cittaikāgryaviruddheṣu deśādigateṣu prācīnapravaṇatvādiṣvanādara iti suhṛdbhāvena sūtrakṛdupadiśati /
GSP33brsgor4u:257: ā prayāṇāt tatrāpi hi dṛṣṭam / BBs_4,1.12 /
GSP33brsgor4u:264: upāstīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ cāntyakāle prāptavyaphalasphūrtidvārā phalahetutve mānamāha-savijñāna iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:265: bhāvanāmayaṃ vijñānaṃ phalasphuraṇaṃ tena sahitaḥ savijñāno vijñānasphuritaphalaṃ vijñānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:266: yasmiṃlloke cittaṃ saṃkalpo 'syeti yaccittastena saṃkalpitena lokena saha phalasphūrtyanantaraṃ manaḥ prāṇe līyate iti yāvat /
GSP33brsgor4u:270: astvidamantyaphalaṃ vijñānaṃ karmaṇamivādṛṣṭadvāropāstīnāṃ tataḥ kuta āmaraṇamāvṛttirityata āha-pratyayāstviti /
GSP33brsgor4u:281: yathopāsakānāṃ yāvajjīvaṃ kartavyamasti na tathātmavidāmiti karmakṣayalakṣaṇāṃ jīvanmuktimāha-tadadhigama iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:283: saṃprati phalādhyāyasthā phalacintā kriyata ityāha-gata iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:289: ataḥ phalāntameva pāpaṃ na madhye naśyatīti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:290: nanu tarhi tannāśārthaṃ prāyaścittavidhirna syāditi cet / na /
GSP33brsgor4u:291: yathā āhitāgnergṛhadāhe nimitte sati 'agnaye kṣāmavate puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet'iti iṣṭividhistadvaddoṣe nimittamātre sati prāyaścittavidherdeṣanāśārthatvāsiddheḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:294: kuryādityatra tu malinaḥ snāyāditivaddoṣapadasya nivṛttidvārā phalaparatvasaṃbhavāt
GSP33brsgor4u:298: karmabhogānantaraṃ deśakālāntare mokṣo bhaviṣyati śāstraprāmāṇyādityāha-netyucyata iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:304: smṛtiśca karmaṇaḥ phalaśaktau pramāṇamataḥ śaktasyāpi kutaścinnāśāṅgīkāreṇa śāstravirodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:315: itarasyāpy evam asaṃśleṣaḥ pāte tu / BBs_4,1.14 /
GSP33brsgor4u:318: jñānātpuṇyaṃ kṣīyate na veti pūrvavatsaṃdehe jñānaṃ tu na puṇyanāśakaṃ śāstrīyatvātpuṇyavadityadhikāśaṅkāmuktvātideśaṃ vyācaṣṭe-dharmasyetyādinā
GSP33brsgor4u:320: nanu kṣīyante cetyaviśeṣaśrutiḥ pāpaviṣayā sarvaṃ pāpmānaṃ taratīti viśeṣaśruterityata āha-yatrāpi kevala iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:324: anārabdhakārye eva tu pūrve tadavadheḥ / BBs_4,1.15 /
GSP33brsgor4u:326: uktakarmakṣayaṃ viṣayīkṛtya kṣīyante cetyaviśeṣaśrutestasya tāvadeva ciramiti śruteśca saṃśayamāha-pūrvayoriti /
GSP33brsgor4u:328: pūrvasiddhāntanyāyena pūrvapakṣaprāptau uktotsargataḥ karmakṣatiḥ prārabdhānyakarmaviṣayetyapavādaṃ siddhānyati-evamiti /
GSP33brsgor4u:330: prārabdhādyāvanna vimucyate tāvāneva vilambastanmokṣe brahma saṃpadyata iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:340: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ karma jñānānnaśyati na veti saṃdehe ubhe puṇyapāpe taratītyaviśeṣaśruternaśyatītyāśaṅkyottarasyāpītyuktātideśasya
GSP33brsgor4u:344: atra bhāṣye jñānakarmaṇoḥ sākṣādekakāryatvaṃ paramatenoktvā sākṣātpāramparyābhyāṃ mokṣahetutvaṃ svamatamuktamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor4u:346: nirguṇavidyāyāḥ karmasāhityaṃ tṛptiṃ prati bhojanasya lāṅgaleneva darśitaṃ,
GSP33brsgor4u:352: yatprārabdhādanyatkāmyaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ ca tadeva vidvatsuhṛddviṣatoḥ svasamānajātīyaṃ karma janayati svayaṃ ca jñānānnaśyatīti bhāvaḥ //17//
GSP33brsgor4u:360: bhavatu vidyāviśiṣṭasya karmaṇo jñānaṃ prati śīghrakāritvākhyaḥ kaścidatiśayo vidyāsāmarthyāt /
GSP33brsgor4u:362: naca tatra śrutau yajñādiśabdānāṃ vidyopetakarmaparatayā saṃkoco yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:364: 'yadeva vidyayā'iti śrutiḥ kevalasyāpi vīryavattvaṃ gamayatīti siddhāntagranthārthaḥ //18//
GSP33brsgor4u:367: bhogena tv itare kṣapayitvātha saṃpadyate / BBs_4,1.19 /
GSP33brsgor4u:370: sa kiṃ prārabdhakṣayānantaraṃ saṃsaratyuta neti nimittabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ saṃśaye siddhāntamupakramate-anārabdheti /
GSP33brsgor4u:375: yattu saṃcitaṃ karmāntaraṃ tanna nimittaṃ phalasya,
GSP33brsgor4u:377: avidyādayo hi kleśāḥ karmaṇastatphalasya ca mūlam /
GSP33brsgor4u:378: taduktaṃ yogaśāstre 'kleśamūlaḥ karmāśayaḥ sati mūle tādvipākaḥ'iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:379: tacca mūlaṃ jñānāgninā dagdhamiti kutaḥ punaḥ saṃsārastasmāddehapāte kaivalyamiti siddham //19//
GSP33brsgor4u:400: uttaratra hi sūtrakṛttattvavida indriyāṇāṃ svarūpalayaṃ vakṣyati tadbalādihādhyāhāra ucitaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:402: prakṛtāveva vikāralaya iti nyāyaviruddhārthaṃ śrutirapi na brūta iti siddhāntayati-atatprakṛtitvāditi /
GSP33brsgor4u:403: nyāyasya niravakāśatvādbalīyastvaṃ śabdasya tūktirvāgitivyutpattyā lakṣaṇayā vā sāvakāśatvamiti dyotayituṃ śabdāccetyuktam //1//
GSP33brsgor4u:410: sarvendriyavṛttilayaścediṣṭastarhi vāṅmanasīti pṛthaksūtraṃ kimarthamityata āha-sarveṣāṃ karaṇānāmiti //2//
GSP33brsgor4u:417: kṛtaḥ iha tvabātmakaprāṇasya annātmakamanaḥprakṛtitvena prakṛtau vikāralaya iti nyāyānugrahānna manaḥśrutirbādhyeti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ pūrvavat,
GSP33brsgor4u:418: siddhāntastvabannayoḥ prakṛtivikṛtibhāve 'pi na tadvikārayoḥ prāṇamanasostadbhāvo himaghaṭayorapi tadbhāvaprasaṅgādato nyāyavirodhātpūrvavacchrutirbādhyeti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:419: āgṛhītā bāhyendriyavṛttayo yena tattathā līnendriyavṛttikaṃ mano 'pi vṛttilayenaiva prāṇe līyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:427: uktanyāyasiddhaṃ prāṇasyāpi vṛttilayamupajīvya 'prāṇastejasi'iti śruterūpagamādiśruteśca saṃśayamuktvā jīve layaṃ vināpi upagamādisaṃbhava iti pūrvapakṣayati-sthitamityādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:429: siddhānte tu bhūtopahita jīvalakṣakatvamiti matvā sūtraṃ yojayati-sa prakṛta ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:431: taṃ jīvaṃ prati prāṇānāmupagamānugamanāvasthānaśrutibhya iti hetvarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:432: yathā yātrecchāvantaṃ rājānaṃ bhṛtyā upagacchantyevameva paralokaṃ jigamiṣuṃ jīvaṃ sarve prāṇā abhimukhyenāyāntītyupagamaḥ śrutaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:435: jīvasya prāptavyaphalāvagamāya hi vijñānasāhityaśrutyāḥ mukhyaprāṇasahitakaraṇānāṃ jīve sthitirbhātītyarthaḥ //4//
GSP33brsgor4u:439: yadyapi prāṇasya tejasyavyavadhānena layaḥ śrutastathāpyubhayaśrutyanugrahāya prāṇo jīve līyate,
GSP33brsgor4u:440: jīvadvārā ca tadupādhiṣu tejaādibhūteṣviti śrutyarthasphuṭīkaraṇārthaṃ sūtraṃ gṛhṇāti-kathaṃ tarhīti /
GSP33brsgor4u:441: naca layaṃ vināpi jīvaṃ pratyipagamādisaṃbhavāttejaḥ śrutirmukhyāstviti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor4u:442: jīvaṃ pratyāgatya prāṇasya nirvyāpāratvena sthiterevātra layatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:443: bhūteṣu jīvasthitiḥ kiṃ balādvyākhyāyata ityāśaṅkya 'so 'dhyakṣe'iti sūtrodāhṛtaśrutibalādityāha-nanvityādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:452: daśārdhānāṃ pañcānāṃ bhūtānāṃ sūkṣmabhāgā iti yāvat /
GSP33brsgor4u:459: evaṃ bāhyendriyāṇāṃ manasi prathamaṃ vṛttilayalābhāttato manovṛtteḥ prāṇe layaḥ prāṇavṛtterbhūtopahitajīve laya ityutkrāntivyavasthoktā /
GSP33brsgor4u:468: na tasya prāṇā utkrāmantīti pratiṣedho 'pi tadviṣayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:471: tata upāsako mūrdhanyanāḍīdvārārcirādimārgaṃ prāpnoti nānya iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:473: na mukhyaṃ 'yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate so 'sya saṃkalpādeva samuttiṣṭhati'iti bhogaśravaṇādityāha-anupoṣya cedamiti /
GSP33brsgor4u:479: pūrvodāhṛtotkrāntivākyaśeṣaṃ vyākhyāya liṅgāśrayapañcabhūtānāṃ kimātyantiko brahmaṇi laya utānātyantika iti layasyobhayathādarśanātsaṃśayamāha-kīdṛśī punariyamiti /
GSP33brsgor4u:485: nanu liṅgātmakasya tejasaḥ kathaṃ sūkṣmatamanāḍīdvārā gatiḥ kuto vā kenacinmūrtena pratighāto nāsti kuto vā na dṛśyata ityata āha-sūkṣmamiti
GSP33brsgor4u:496: pratiṣedhād iti cen na śārīrāt / BBs_4,2.12 /
GSP33brsgor4u:500: sakāmasya saṃsāroktyanantaraṃ niṣkāmasya muktiprakaraṇārtho 'thaśabdaḥ ātmakāmatvāt pūrṇānandātmavittvādāptakāmaḥ prāptaparamānandaḥ,
GSP33brsgor4u:504: jñānina utkrāntirasti na veti pañcamīṣaṣṭhīśrutibhyāṃ saṃdehe siddhāntiśaṅkānirāsapūrvakaṃ pūrvapakṣayati-netyādinā //12//
GSP33brsgor4u:509: kāṇvaśrutau tāvattasyeti sarvanāmnā prakṛtaṃ jñāninaṃ parāmṛśya saṃbandhasāmānyamuktaṃ
GSP33brsgor4u:510: tatra mādhyandinaśākhāyāṃ tasmādityapādānatvarūpaviśeṣa ukto grāhyastathāca jīvātprāṇotkrāntipratiṣedho
GSP33brsgor4u:511: bhāti na dehāttacchabdena dehasyānuktestasmājjñānino 'pyutkrāntirastīti jñānavaiyarthyamiti pūrvapakṣaphalam /
GSP33brsgor4u:517: yeṣāṃ pañcamīpāṭhasteṣāṃ yadyapi dehinaḥ prādhānyaṃ tathāpi dehadehinorabhedāttasmāditi dehaṃ parāmṛśya tadāpādana evotkrāntipratiṣedha iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsgor4u:520: saṃbandhaviśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ bhoktā prāṇānāṃ bhogopakaraṇatvaviśeṣo 'traiva prāṇamayo manomayaḥ iti pūrvaśrutyukto grāhyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:522: ato vidvatsaṃbandhiprāṇānāmutkrāntyapādānāpekṣāyāṃ cakṣuṣṭo vā mūrdhnovetyuktadehapradeśā eva grāhyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:523: tathācāyamarthaḥ-tasya viduṣo bhogopakaraṇātmakāḥ prāṇāḥ dehapradeśebhyo notkrāmantīti /
GSP33brsgor4u:524: evaṃ ca prāptotkrāntiniṣedhārthatvaṃ vākyasyeti sarvaṃ caturasram /
GSP33brsgor4u:526: samyagātmabhāvena bhūtāni paśyataḥ apadasya prāpyapadarahitasya padaiṣiṇo devā api mārge muhyanti mārgaṃ na jānanti tadabhāvāditi smṛtiyojanā
GSP33brsgor4u:534: tāni pare tathā hy āha / BBs_4,2.15 /
GSP33brsgor4u:536: pūrvatra gatiniṣedhena vidvatkalānāṃ ghrāṇādīnāmatraiva laya uktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:537: tamupajīvya sa kiṃ tattatkalāprakṛtiṣu pṛthivyādiṣu syāduta paramātmanīti śrutidvayadarśanātsaṃśayaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:538: tatra sākṣātprakṛtau vikāralaya iti nyāyānugṛhītayā 'gatāḥ kalāḥ'iti śrutyā pūrvapakṣamagre vadannādau siddhāntamāha-tānīti /
GSP33brsgor4u:539: yathā nadyaḥ samudraṃ prāpya līyante evamevāsya paritaḥ sarvatra brahmadraṣṭurimāḥ prāṇaśraddhādyāḥ puruṣāyaṇāḥ puruṣe kalpitāḥ puruṣameva jñeyaṃ prāpya layaṃ gacchantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:543: vastugatyā vidvaddṛṣṭyā paramātmani kalālaye 'pi lokadṛṣṭyā pratiṣṭhāsu layoktiraviruddhā /
GSP33brsgor4u:544: tathāca kalāḥ svaprakṛtiṣu vilāpya tābhiḥ saha puruṣe līyante iti śrutidvayatātparyam //15//
GSP33brsgor4u:560: tadokograjvalanaṃ tatprakāśitadvāro vidyāsāmarthyāt taccheṣagatyanusmṛtiyogāc ca hārdānugṛhītāḥ śatādhikayā / BBs_4,2.17 /
GSP33brsgor4u:564: tasya hṛdayasyāgraṃ nāḍīmukhaṃ tasya jvalanaṃ bhāviphalasphuraṇaṃ pradyotākhyam /
GSP33brsgor4u:565: cakṣuṣo vetyaniyamaśrutestayorghvamāyanniti viśeṣaśruteśca saṃśayaḥ-kimupāsako 'pyanupāsakavadyena kenaciddvāreṇa nirgacchati uta mūrdhanyanāḍyaiveti
GSP33brsgor4u:569: yena kenacinmārgeṇa nirgatasyāpi brahmalokaprāptau vidyaśeṣatvena mārgānusmṛtividheḥ kevalādṛṣṭārthatvaṃ syādato 'nvahaṃ smṛtenaiva mārgeṇa gamanaṃ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:572: suṣumnākhyā nāḍī hṛdayāt nirgatā dakṣiṇākṣitālukaṇṭhāntastananāsikāmadhyābhittidvārā brahmarandhraṃ prāptā sūryaraśmibhirekīkṛtā brahmalokamārga upāsakasyeti sthitam //17//
GSP33brsgor4u:578: atha prārabdhānte etadutkramaṇaṃ yadā syādatha tadā etaireva nāḍīsaṃbaddhai raśmibhirutkrāmatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:585: niśi neti cen na sambandhasya yāvaddehabhāvitvād darśayati ca / BBs_4,2.19 /
GSP33brsgor4u:587: śirā nāḍyaḥ pratāyante vistṛtā bhavanti sṛptāḥ saṃbaddhāḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:591: kiñca yadi rātrau mṛtasya raśmiyogaṃ vinaivordhvagatiḥ syāttadā raśmiśruterdivāmṛtaviṣayatayā saṃkocaḥ syādūrdhvagatyabhāve ca vidyāyāmapravṛttiḥ syāt /
GSP33brsgor4u:598: evaṃ dakṣiṇāyane mṛto vidvānvidyāphalamāpnoti na veti vidyāyā nityavatphalaśruteruttarāyaṇaprāśastyaśāstrācca saṃdehe pūrvoktahetūnatidiśati-ataścāyane 'pi dakṣiṇe /
GSP33brsgor4u:602: tathāca devatāyāḥ sadā sattvādvidyayā dakṣiṇāyanakāle 'pi tatprāptiraviruddheti bhāvaḥ //20//
GSP33brsgor4u:605: yoginaḥ prati ca smaryete smārte caite / BBs_4,2.21 /
GSP33brsgor4u:608: smārtayogināṃ tu kālāpekṣā smṛtāvucyata ityavirodhamāha-yogina iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:609: yogī daharādyupāsaka eva smṛtyuktaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-smārte ceti /
GSP33brsgor4u:610: bhagavadārādhanabuddhyānuṣṭhitaṃ karma yogaḥ 'anāśritaḥ karmaphalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:611: sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca'iti smṛteḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:616: yadi tu śrautārthapratyabhijñayā kālaśabdo devatāparastarhyaikārthyameveti samādhyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:619: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandakṛtau śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ caturthadhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:624: evamutkrāntiṃ nirūpya tatsādhyaṃ mārgaṃ gantavyaṃ ca nirūpayituṃ pādamārabhate-arcirādinā tatprathiteḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:628: pūrvaṃ yadākadācinmṛtasyāpi phalaprāptiruktā tadvadyena kenacinmārgeṇa gatiriti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ vikalpaḥ,
GSP33brsgor4u:632: kiñca mārgabhede satyasmādayaṃ mārgastvarayā prāpaka iti yuktaṃ na mārgaikya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:639: parāvato dīrghāyuṣo hiraṇyagarbhasya parā dīrghāḥ samāḥ saṃvatsarānvasanti kāryabrahmaṇo yā jitiḥ sarvatra jayaḥ,
GSP33brsgor4u:643: yathā laukikamārge vilambastathā arcirādau neti tvarāvacanopapattirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:652: arcirādiṣvasmādayamanantara iti krameṇa viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva ucyata ityadhikaraṇasya tātparyamuktvā viṣayamāha-sa etamiti /
GSP33brsgor4u:654: sa kiṃ arcirātmakāgneranantaramuta saṃvatsarātpara iti pāṭhādvakṣyamāṇaviśeṣaśruteśca saṃśaye siddhāntamevopakramate-ucyata iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:655: puruṣaḥ upāsako 'smāllokāddehātpraiti nirgacchati tasmai prāptāya puruṣāya sa vāyustatra svātmani vijihīte chidraṃ karoti,
GSP33brsgor4u:656: tena vāyudattena rathacakrachidratulyena dvāreṇordhvamādityaṃ gacchatīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:661: kāṇvānāṃ tu tenetyūrdhvamiti ca śabdābhyāṃ kramaniścayātpāṭhabādha iti siddhāntārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:663: vājiśrutisthe tu saṃvatsarasyāśruteḥ kathamabdātparo vāyurityata āha-vājeti /
GSP33brsgor4u:664: tarhi devalokādvāyumiti sūtraṃ syādityata āha-vāyumabdāditi tviti /
GSP33brsgor4u:665: saṃvatsarasya māsāvayavitvānmāsānantaryaṃ saṃvatsarātparo devalokastataḥ paro vāyurvāyoḥ para āditya iti śrutidvaye kramo niṣpannaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:671: evaṃ kauṣītakibhiragnyanantaraṃ paṭhitasya vāyoḥ sthānamuktvā vāyvanantaraṃ paṭhitasya varuṇasyārcirādimārge sthānamāha-taḍito 'dhi varuṇaḥ saṃbandhāt /
GSP33brsgor4u:672: paṭhito varuṇādirmārgaparvatvena saṃbadhyate na veti saṃdehe 'rciṣo 'harityādi pañcamyārcirādīnāṃ
GSP33brsgor4u:676: varuṇasyābdvārā vidyusaṃbandhāt 'āgantukānāmante niveśaḥ'iti nyāyāycca vidyudānantarye sati yathāpāṭhamindraprajāpatyoḥ krama ityarthaḥ //3//
GSP33brsgor4u:683: arcirādayo vidyudantāścetanā netāraścāmānavapurūṣeṇa netrā saha paṭhitatvāditi siddhāntayati-evamityādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:686: eva mānavāḥ prakṛtāḥ prakaraṇabalādvidyudanantaraṃ mānavasya netuḥ prāptau prakaraṇaprāptanetṛtvānuvādenāmānavatvamekameva
GSP33brsgor4u:688: netṛprakaraṇānaṅgīkāre tvamānavaḥ puruṣo gamayatīti vākyaṃ bhidyeta amānavatvavannetṛtvasyāpyaprāpteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:697: arciraharādīnāmasthiratvādrātryādau mṛtasya pratīkṣā nāstītyuktatvācca na mārgacihnatvaṃ bhogyatvaṃ vā,
GSP33brsgor4u:709: śrutyā varuṇādīnāṃ netṛtvābhāve 'pyanugrāhakatvena mārgāntarbhāva iti bhāvaḥ //6//
GSP33brsgor4u:713: evaṃ mārgaṃ nirūpya gantavyaṃ cintayati-kāryaṃ bādarirasya gatyupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:714: paraṃ brahma gantavyamiti pūrvapakṣe mārgasya muktyarthatā kāryaṃ brahmeti siddhānte bhogārthateti matvā prathamaṃ siddhāntamāha-tatra kāryameveti
GSP33brsgor4u:729: kāryātyaye tadadhyakṣeṇa sahātaḥ param abhidhānāt / BBs_4,3.10 /
GSP33brsgor4u:734: kutātmānaḥ śuddhadhiyastatrotpannasamyagdhiyaḥ sarve brahmaṇā mucyamānena saha paraṃ
GSP33brsgor4u:736: evaṃ siddhāntamuktvā tena nirastaṃ pūrvapakṣamāha-kaṃ punarityādinā // 9 // // 10 // // 11 // //12//
GSP33brsgor4u:740: daharavidyāyāṃ kaṭhavallīṣu parabrahmaprakaraṇe ca tayordhvamāyanniti gatirdarśitā //13//
GSP33brsgor4u:745: saṃprati prajāpateḥ sabhāṃ veśma prāpnuyāmiti upāsakasya maraṇakāle kāryaprāptisaṃkalpaśruterna paraṃ gantavyamiti śaṅkāṃ nirasyati-naca kārya iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:749: tathā rājñāṃ yaśo viśāṃ yaśa iti sārvātmyaliṅgācca paraprāptisaṃkalpa evāyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:750: astu veśmapratipattīcchā parabrahmaviṣayā tathāpi sā kathaṃ gatipūrvikā syādityata āha-sā ceti /
GSP33brsgor4u:751: tattatra brahmaloke vidyāvidhīnenāparājitā pūrasti brahmaṇo hiraṇyagarbhasya tenaiva
GSP33brsgor4u:752: prabhuṇāṃ vimitaṃ nirmitaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ veśmāsti tatpratipadyate vidvāniti daharavidyāyāṃ
GSP33brsgor4u:755: kiñca pada gatāviti dhātupāṭhādveśma prapadye ityatra mārgāpekṣā bhātītyāha-paderapīti /
GSP33brsgor4u:759: gantavyatvasya brahmalokeṣviti bahuvacanādeḥ saṃkalpādeva gandhādidivyabhogaśruteśca parabrahmaṇyasaṃbhavānmukhyārthatyāga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:760: yadyapyetadvai satyakāma paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahmetyādiśrutiṣu prayogasāmyādbrahmaśabda
GSP33brsgor4u:761: ubhayatra rūḍhatayā mukhyaḥeva tathāpi pūrṇe parasminnavayavārthasya niratiśayamahattvasya
GSP33brsgor4u:765: yathā vidyāsaṃbaddhasuṣumnāstutyarthaṃ tadasaṃbaddhanāḍyantarakīrtanaṃ tathā paravidyāstutyarthaṃ tatprakaraṇe 'pyaparavidyāśrayagatikīrtanaṃ
GSP33brsgor4u:766: gatiṃ vināpi hi paravidyā niratiśayaphalā tasyāṃ tvaparavidyāphalaṃ gatisādhyamantarbhavatīti stutilābhādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:772: sarvagatasya svātmabhūtasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ saṃsāradeśāddeśāntareṇa tatkālātkālāntareṇa viśiṣṭatayā gantavyatvaṃ syāditi pṛthivīvayodṛṣṭāntābhyāṃ śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brsgor4u:775: nanu yuktaṃ bhūvayasoḥ prāptayorapi deśāntarakālāntaraviśiṣṭatvena gantavyatvaṃ tayorgantṛbhinnatvāt,
GSP33brsgor4u:777: yā prāptā bhūḥ sā na gantavyā yacca gantavyaṃ deśāntaraṃ tattvaprāptamiti kutaḥ prāptasya gantavyatā vayaso 'pi kālāntare 'bhivyaktimātraṃ na gantavyatvamiti vastugatiḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:778: aṅgīkṛtya viśiṣṭabhūvayasorgantavyatāṃ parabrahmaṇo deśakālavaiśiṣṭyābhāvānna kathañcidapi gantavyatetyāha-netyādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:779: 'anādimatparaṃ brahma'ityādyā smṛtirdṛśyaviśeṣasya dṛśi kalpitatvāddṛgātmano nirviśeṣateti nyāyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:789: na kevalaṃ nyāyāccheṣatā kintu śrutyāpītyāha-pratyakṣaṃ tviti /
GSP33brsgor4u:790: tatra mūlakāraṇe brahmaṇyetacchuṅgaṃ jagadātmakaṃ kāryamutpannamityupakramya tena śuṅgena tanmūlamanvicchetyupasaṃhāre sata eva jñeyatvamuktaṃ chāndogye /
GSP33brsgor4u:791: tathā taittirīyake 'pi jagajjanmādyanuvādena brahmaṇa eva jñeyatvaṃ darśitamataḥ sṛṣṭiśrutīnāṃ śrutyaiva nirviśeṣadhīśeṣatā bhātītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:794: evaṃ gantavyālocanayā gatiṃ nirasya gantrālocanayāpi nirasyati-gatikalpanāyāṃ cetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:800: vikārāvayavarūpajīvaviśiṣṭasyaḥ brahmaṇaḥ sthiratvājjīvānāṃ gatyāgatī na syātām /
GSP33brsgor4u:805: bhinnayorabhedo mukhyo na yukto virodhāditi pariharati-neti /
GSP33brsgor4u:806: kiñca pakṣatrayamapyayuktaṃ saṃsāritvasya tāttvikajīvabhāvasya nāśe tāttvivajīvasvarūpanāśaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsgor4u:807: nacāsmābhiriva tvayā brahmātmatvaṃ jīvasya tāttvikarūpamaṅgīkṛtaṃ yadasya saṃsāranāśe 'pi na naśyedityāha-sarveṣviti /
GSP33brsgor4u:809: saṃsārābhāvaḥ kila mokṣaḥ sa ca karmābhāvamātreṇa setsyatīti kramajaḍānāṃ matamudbhāvya nirasyati-yattvityādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:813: nanu tavāpyetattarkamātramekasmiñjanmanyanekaviruddhaphalānāṃ karmaṇāṃ bhogāyogādastyavaśiṣṭaṃ karma janmāntarasya nimittamityāśaṅkya tatra mānamāha-karmaśeṣasadbhāvasiddhiśceti /
GSP33brsgor4u:814: santvanārabdhaphalāni puṇyapāpāni teṣāṃ nityādyanuṣṭhānena kṣayānna janmāntaramiti śaṅkate-syādetaditi /
GSP33brsgor4u:816: pāpasyāpi sarvātmanā puṇyanāśyatve mānaṃ nāstīti saṃcitapuṇyapāpābhyāṃ janmāntaraṃ durvāramityāha-tannetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:820: pratyavāyanirāsārthe nityādyācāre satyanu paścātphalāntaraṃ niṣpadyata ityatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:824: jñānaṃ vinā dehapāte mokṣa eveti niścayālābhāttvatpakṣe kṣatiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:825: brahmabhinnasya jīvasyaṃ kartṛtvādisvabhāvasya mokṣāśāpi na yuktetyāha-naceti /
GSP33brsgor4u:826: kartṛtvādirūpaṃ kāryaṃ na svabhāvaḥ kintu tacchaktiriti śaṅkate-syādetaditi /
GSP33brsgor4u:827: kāryagamyāyāḥ śakteḥ kāryasyātyantānutpāde sattvamayuktamataḥ śaktisattve tadviṣayasya
GSP33brsgor4u:828: kāryasyādṛṣṭadeśakālādinimittānāṃ cātmanā śaktidvārā nityasaṃbaddhatvānmokṣo na syāditi
GSP33brsgor4u:835: kathaṃ tarhi kaiścitparaviṣayatvaṃ gateruktamityāśaṅkya bhrāntetyāha-tatra parāpareti /
GSP33brsgor4u:836: praśnapūrvakaṃ parāparabrahmavibhāgaṃ vadannaparabrahmaṇi gaterarthavattvamāha-kiṃ dve ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor4u:840: apratīkālambanān nayatīti bādarāyaṇa ubhayathā ca doṣāt tatkratuś ca / BBs_4,3.15 /
GSP33brsgor4u:845: idānīmapatīkopāsakānāmeva mārgo na sarveṣāṃ vikāropāsakānāmityubhayathābhāvoktau pūrvoktavirodhaḥ syāt,
GSP33brsgor4u:850: aniyamaḥ sarvāsāmiti sūtre sarvaśabdasya pratīkopāsakānyaparatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:851: yadyapi pratīkadhyāyināṃ pitṛyāṇatṛtīyasthānayorapraveśādarcirādimārgo vācyastathāpi teṣāṃ vidyutparyantameva gamanamastu na brahmaprāptirbrahmakratutvābhāvāt
GSP33brsgor4u:852: yo yat dhyāyati sa tatprāpnoti hi tatkratunyāyaḥ śrutimūlaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:853: pratīkeṣu ca nāmādiṣu dhyeyeṣu brahmaṇo guṇatvāt,
GSP33brsgor4u:855: asya ca nyāyasya pañcāgnividyāyāmāhatyavādātpratyakṣavacanādbādha iṣṭa iti sūtrabhāṣyārthaḥ //15//
GSP33brsgor4u:859: kiñca pratīkatāratamyena phalatāratamyaśruterna pratīkadhyāyināṃ brahmaprāptirityāha-viśeṣaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor4u:860: tasmādasati vacane brahmadhyāyina eva brahmagantāra iti siddham //16//
GSP33brsgor4u:874: svaśabdaśrutibādhito nyāyaḥ abhiniṣpattiśca sākṣātkāravṛttyabhiprāyā bandhadhvaṃsajanmanyaupacārikveveti matvā siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brsgor4u:875: mokṣasya phalatvena prāptāgantukatvanirāsārthaḥ svaśabda iti yuktaṃ svīyavācitve 'tvanarthakānuvādaḥ syādityarthaḥ //1//
GSP33brsgor4u:880: jāgarite hyāndhyādidehadharmavānbhavati svapne tu hata eva kenacit /
GSP33brsgor4u:883: bandhadaśāyāṃ kaluṣitātmanā tiṣṭhati mokṣe tu vigalitākhiladuḥkhaḥ paritaḥ pradyotamānapūrṇānandātmanāvatiṣṭhata iti mahān viśeṣa ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:889: kāryaṃ prāpto 'pi muktaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-na cānativṛtta iti //3//
GSP33brsgor4u:894: svarūpasthitamuktamupajīvya vādivivādāt brahmabhedābhedasaṃśaye satyatyantabhedaṃ pūrvapakṣamuktvā siddhāntamāha-yasyeti //4//
GSP33brsgor4u:898: brāhmeṇa jaiminiḥuktaṃ brahma svarūpamupajīvya sa kiṃ satyena sarvajñatvādidharmeṇa
GSP33brsgor4u:899: yuktastiṣṭhati uta dharmasya śaśaśṛṅgavadatyantāsattvāccinmātrātmanā tiṣṭhati kiṃ
GSP33brsgor4u:906: sarvajña ityādistu vyapadeśo 'yaṃ hi noddeśaḥ vidhyabhāvānnāpi vidhiḥ siddhavannirdeśādityarthaḥ //5//
GSP33brsgor4u:914: cinmātre mukte jakṣaṇādiśrutiḥ kathaṃ tatrāha-ata eva ceti /
GSP33brsgor4u:918: evam apy upanyāsāt pūrvabhāvād avirodhaṃ bādarāyaṇaḥ / BBs_4,4.7 /
GSP33brsgor4u:923: ye īśvaradharmāsta eva cidātmani mukte jīvāntarairvyavahriyante iti /
GSP33brsgor4u:926: kintu tadaṃśanāśenāṃśārabdhādhyātmikaśarīradvayābhimānino muktāvaṃśāntaropādhikā jīvā vyavahartāra iti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:927: tarhi nānavidyāpakṣa eva kuto nādriyate jīvabhedasyāvaśyakatvāditi cet / na /
GSP33brsgor4u:928: prakṛtinānātvaṃ pratijīvaṃ prapañcabheda ityādyaprāmāṇikānekārthagauravāditi sarvavṛddhasaṃmata ekāvidyāpakṣa eva śreyān,
GSP33brsgor4u:937: na caivakāravirodhaḥ saṃkalpena sāmagryā ayogavyavacchedena saulabhyārthatvāt,
GSP33brsgor4u:940: siddhānte tu vidyābalena saṃkalpasyaiva bhogapuṣṭikaratvasiddhiriti bedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:941: kiñca yadi bhogasaṃkalpānantaramapi yatnāntarasādhyanimittāpekṣā syāttarhi nimittaprāpteḥ
GSP33brsgor4u:942: prāgjātasaṃkalpasya vandhyatvaṃ syādbhoge vilambāttataḥ satyasaṃkalpaśruterna yatnāntarāpekṣetyāha-nimittāntaramapi tviti //8 //
GSP33brsgor4u:947: īśvaradharma eva viduṣyāvirbhūta iti na saṃkalpabhaṅga iti bhāvaḥ //9//
GSP33brsgor4u:950: abhāvaṃ bādarir āha hy evam / BBs_4,4.10 /
GSP33brsgor4u:952: evakāravanmanaseti viśeṣaṇenānyayogavyavacchedāddehādyabhāva iti pūrvapakṣayati-abhāvaṃ bādarirāha hyevam /
GSP33brsgor4u:954: tatra dehādayo na santyeva sadā santyeveti ca pakṣadvayaṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:955: kālabhedenecchayā santi na santi ceti siddhāntapakṣo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:965: āsateti copayantīti vā coditatvaṃ satralakṣaṇamiti sthitiḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:966: tathā dvādaśāhena prajākāmaṃ yājayediti yajaticodanādarśanānniyatakartṛkatvāvagamena dvirātrādivadahīnatvaṃ cetyarthaḥ // 12 // // 13 // //14//
GSP33brsgor4u:974: sa ekadhā tridhā pañcadhetyādiśrutyā viduṣa evānekadhābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:979: yadyapi mūlapradīpasya vartyantareṣūtpannadīpānāṃ cātyantabhedo 'sti liṅgasya tu dehabhedakṛto bhedo na svataḥ,
GSP33brsgor4u:982: tathāpi pradīpatvajātyaikyena vyaktiṣvaikyāropāt dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayoḥ sāmyaṃ dṛṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsgor4u:983: tathāca yathā pradīpo 'naikavartiṣu praviśati evaṃ vidyāyogabalādvidvaliṅgasya vyāpitvādanekadeheṣu yugapadāveśa iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:986: yadanādi mana ekadehasthaṃ tadanusārīṇi dehāntarasthāpi manāṃsi bhavanti tadavasthānāṃ tanniyamyatvasaṃbhavāditi /
GSP33brsgor4u:988: nirmāṇacittānyasmitāmātrātpravṛttibhede prayojakaṃ cittamekamanekeṣāmiti hi bhagavatpatañjalinā sūtritam /
GSP33brsgor4u:997: na tu taddvitīyamastīti kvacitsuṣuptimadhikṛtyoktaṃ 'tatkena kam'ityādi kvacinmuktiṃ prakṛtyoktam /
GSP33brsgor4u:998: evaṃ viśeṣajñānābhāvavacanaṃ suṣuptimuktyanyatarāpekṣaṃ saguṇopāsakasya bhogoktau na virudhyate bhinnaviṣayatvādityāha-svāpyayeti /
GSP33brsgor4u:1001: atra samutthānādivākyaṃ muktiviṣayaṃ yatra suptā iti suptiviṣayamiti vibhāgaḥ //16//
GSP33brsgor4u:1009: siddhānte tu vidyāyogināmīśvaraniyamyatvādekasya nityasiddhasyeśvarasyaiva jagatkartṛtvasiddhiriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1010: pralayātsargasamaye yasyekṣaṇapūrvaṃ kartṛtvaṃ śrutau prakṛtaṃ tasyaiva niyantṛtvādirjagadvyāpāraḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1015: ekaṃ pratyanyeṣāṃ guṇatve tveka eveśvara ityāha-samanaskatvāditi //17//
GSP33brsgor4u:1021: manasaspatiḥ sūryamaṇḍalāntaḥsthaḥ paramātmā 'tat saviturvareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi /
GSP33brsgor4u:1023: tathāca yadi pūrvaṃ niraṅkuśaṃ svārājyamuktaṃ syāttarhi īśvarasyāgre prāpyatāṃ na brūyāt /
GSP33brsgor4u:1024: ato bhoge svārājyaṃ na jagajjanmādiṣviti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1029: vikārāvarti ca tathā hi sthitim āha / BBs_4,4.19 /
GSP33brsgor4u:1035: yathā jñānābhāvānnirguṇaṃ na prāptaṃ tathā dhyānābhāvājjagatsraṣṭṛtvādi na prāpyate /
GSP33brsgor4u:1040: tamupāsakaṃ brahmalokagatamāha-hiraṇyagarbhaḥ mayā khalvimā āpo amṛtarūpā mīyante bhujyante tavāpyasau loko 'mṛtodakalakṣaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1052: bādarāyaṇapadena badarikāśramavāsoktyā nityasarvajñasya paramagurornārāyaṇasya prasādadyotanāttapraṇītaśāstre niravadyatāṃ dyotayati /
GSP33brsgor4u:1053: saguṇavidyāyāḥ sātiśayaphalatve 'pi tato nirguṇavidyānāvṛttirityāha-anāvṛttiḥ śabdādanāvṛttiḥ śabdāt /
GSP33brsgor4u:1054: ye brahmalokaṃ gacchanti te taṃ prāpya nāvartante iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1056: ito 'smātpṛthivīlokāttṛtīyasyāṃ divi yo brahmalokastasminnara iti ṇya iti cārṇakatulyau sudhāhṛdāvityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1060: yadyapi teṣāmiha na punarāvṛttirimaṃ mānavamiti ca śrutiṣvihemamiti viśeṣaṇādasminkalpe brahmalokaṃ gatānāṃ kalpāntare āvṛttirbhāti,
GSP33brsgor4u:1062: ye tu daharādīśvaropāstyā gatāsteṣāṃ saguṇavidyāphalakṣaye 'pi niravagraheśvarānugrahalabdhātmajñānānmuktiriti niyama ityabhipretyāha-antavattve 'pi tviti /
GSP33brsgor4u:1063: nanvatra sūtrakṛtā saguṇavidāmevānāvṛttikrama ukto na nirguṇavidāṃ tatra ko heturityāśaṅkya teṣāmāvṛttiśaṅkābhāvādityāha-samyagiti /
GSP33brsgor4u:1066: ataḥ svata eva samyagdarśināmāvṛttiśaṅkā neti kimu vācyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1069: evaṃ samanvayoktyā brahmātmaikyasya vedāntapramāṇakatvamavadhārayituṃ vākyārthajñāne smṛtitarkādisarvaprakāravirodhaḥ parihṛtaḥ,
GSP33brsgor4u:1075: śārīkasya bhāṣyasya kṛtā vyākhyā satāṃ mude //1//
GSP33brsgor4u:1078: vakṣasyakṣṇośca pārśve karatalayugale kaustubhābhāṃ dayāṃ ca sītāṃ kodaṇḍadīkṣāmabhayavarayutāṃ vīkṣya rāmāṅgasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor4u:1079: svasyāḥ kva syāditīyaṃ hṛdi kṛtamananā bhāṣyaratnaprabhākhyā,
GSP33brsgor4u:1082: śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ caturthādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ //
